price: Sunã da wata azãba a cikin rãyuwar dũniya, kuma haƙĩƙa azãbar Lãhira ce mafi tsanani kuma bãbu wani mai tsare su daga Allah.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ عَذَابٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَقُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lahum ʿadhābun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaqqu wamā lahum mina al-lahi min wāqin
